definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Boolean" id="CooldownActive">CooldownActive</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:HitByArrow</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">MAGIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_random_int_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion_advanced"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:HitByArrow</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">30</field></block></value><value name="ambient"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="particles"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
